text:
Since few years, I am definitely sure that my job has to be school teacher.
At first, I am feeling that children are my passion. Indeed, I like not only to play and to talk to them but also to try to understand the way they think and act. I am working as an animator and when I am going to work, I can't wait to see them, I am sure that I am going to have a great day thanks to them.
Secondly, the teacher job is a job that I'm interested in since few years now because since I am a child, I've always liked to teach things. For instance, I am used to learn my classes by explaining them to an imaginary class in my room. It seems weird like that but it is very useful ! I liked to propose my help to my class students if they did not understand a notion as well. In other words, help people and especially at school is a thing that I could do during hours. But I am very conscious that to teach is not an easy thing because I talk about it with a lot of teachers especially from primary school and it takes a lot of time and it's necessary to be patient and organised but I feel that I am able to do that.
Finally, I want to work especially with children because I am feeling that they are necessary to my happiness and my development on earth : I am a very anxious person and I feel that I'm lost in the adult world. Therefore, when I'm with children, I am forgetting my problems because I don't have the time to think about them as I have to take care of a group of children. We can say that they are like a therapy for me.
